an5.158:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu sarajjam okkanto hoti.
an5.158:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, dussilo hoti, appassuto hoti, kusito hoti, duppanno hoti.
an5.158:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu sarajjam okkanto hoti.
an5.158:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu visarado hoti.
an5.158:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, silava hoti, bahussuto hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti.
an5.158:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu visarado hoti”ti.
